title: Follow live: Round 1 of the 2025 NBA draft
Fleming goes to Suns at No. 31 as draft resumes
description: The Suns opened the second round of the NBA draft by taking Rasheer Fleming after agreeing to acquire the pick earlier Thursday from the Timberwolves.

title: 'It's a long, long time since we played like that' - are Man City back?
description: The Club World Cup may have had a lukewarm reception in some parts, but Manchester City did their best to kindle interest with a statement victory over Juventus on Thursday.

title: GB No 33 Tarvet reaches Wimbledon - why will he not get full prize money?
description: Britain's Oliver Tarvet reaches the Wimbledon singles main draw - which will contain the highest number of home players for 41 years.

title: Championship fixtures: Birmingham vs Ipswich, Southampton vs Wrexham open 2025/26
description: Birmingham vs Ipswich will kick off the new 2025/26 Sky Bet Championship season on Friday August 8, live on Sky Sports.

title: Lions squad for Force clash revealed as Farrell rings changes
description: Dan Sheehan will captain the British and Irish Lions on his debut for the side as head coach Andy Farrell makes 13 changes to the starting XV for Saturday's clash vs Western Force in Perth.

title: Alijah Martin drafted by Toronto Raptors in second round of 2025 NBA draft
description: Former Florida guard Alijah Martin was selected by the Toronto Raptors in the second round of the 2025 NBA draft after a five-year college career.

title: Pacers draft Marquette's Kam Jones at No. 38: What to know about the point guard
description: "I'm just ready to get to Naptown and get to work," Kam Jones told ESPN's Monica McNutt after being selected.
